data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the county of Jiuquan. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jiuquan, Gansu, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Jiuquan, Gansu, China to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Jiuquan to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 21,234 believers in Jiuquan against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Father, I pray that the Yugur, Saragh people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Yugur, Saragh people know you.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Jiuquan, Gansu, China to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 258,667 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the county of Jiuquan who will make disciples who make disciples.

data.section_summary:
the county of Jiuquan, Gansu, China has a population of 279,900.

We estimate Jiuquan has 21,234 people who might know Jesus, 4,522 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 254,145 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 21,234 believers in Jiuquan to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 258,667 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.
